topics.body:
You know; call me a hypocrite but I just do not get otakus.  Sure liking anime or japanese mass media is perfectly fine, but I just do not get why so many go, "Kawaii desu I'm going to learn Japanese to go to Japan to become hokage!"

It's perfectly fine to like stuff, but why do so many people want to move to Japan when they know jack shit about the country or the culture or the society?  Is this like how people watch tv from the the USA and thinks Americans ride Abrams tanks to work while playing the national anthem and get their mail delivered by bald eagles?[/sarcasm]

It's probably a good thing Japan dissuades immigration cause chances are they would get a bunch of idiots going, "desu desu desu desu desu".

Before you ask, no I'm not talking about you Trash or more than likely anyone in this thread; I'm just talking about in general.  The anime club at my school is pretty much metaphorical cancer incarnate.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53db68486368727d3a270100#post_53db68486368727d3a270100
 Those kinds of People tend to quit Trying to learn Japanese very quickly, I at least understand that It's difficult. (Even if I am a fast learner, I'm not expecting to be a master by the end of the year.)

And I understand that I know Jack shit about Japan, But I'm going to try to actually do something about that at some point. (Once I can get a good enough grasp on Raw Toku)

!http://www.rockethideout.com/articles/images/mechaanime/ma26.jpg!
HARRO EBURIBODEI,

MAI NAME ISU MIKEU SOUNDERS JYUSANSEI, ANDO AI HEITO EBURI SHINGURU WAN OBU YUU. ARU OBU YUU ARU ZONDERIAN, GOTTDAYUM BADDO GUYSU WHUU SUPENDO EBURII DEI ANDAA ZA TOKYO TAWAA. YUU ARU EBURISENGU BADDO IN ZA WARUDO. HONESUTORI, HABU YUU EBAA SET OWN DISUKU EKKUSU? AI MEENO, AI GESSU ITSU FUAN BEINGU JAIANTO SUPEISU MATARU MONSUTAAZU, BATTO YUU ARU TEIKU ITTO TSU A HORU NYUU REBERU. ZISU ISU UASSU ZAN RIBINGU IN ZA TORAINARI SOURA SHISUTEMU.

DONNTO BUI A SUTRORAINJYA. JASUTO HITTO ME UISU YOUA BESUTO SHOTTO. AIMU PURITTEI MACHU PAAFEKUTO. AIMU ZA BESUTO MYUJIKARU SUUPA MECHANOIDO EBAA KURIEITEDO, ANDO SAIKYO DATTZE. WHAT'S DO YUU DO ARU DEI, AZAA ZAN KONPUREIN ABAUTO GAOGAIGAA? AI AMU ARUSO ZA BESUTO FURENDO TSU JYAPANESU CHIDREN, ANDO HABU SORITERI UEIBU RAISAA(ITTO JUSTO PUREIDO DISUKU EKUSU, SHITTO UAZU SOU CASSHU) YOU ARU AARU BADDO ROBOTTOZU HUU SHUUDO GETTO HERRU ANDO HEBUNDO BAI MAI FURENDO GAOGAIGAA. SANKUSU FUAA RISENINGU.

PIKKU RIIREITEDO, ITSU MII ANDO GIRAGIRAN DABURU BUI.

topics.body:
Here's something interesting; doctor's have found out how to give paralyzed men the ability to have sex again.

If you don't know the part where the nervous system links up to sexual organs is low on the spine so if you break your spine bye bye stiffy.

I mainly glanced over it, but the way they got over this is electrical stimulation to stimulate a response so you can get your stimulation.
